name: df-htpy
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5
body: |- wceq(chtpy, cmpo(s0, s1, ctop, ctop, cmpo(s2, s3, co(cv(s0), ccn, cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), ccn, cv(s1)), crab(s4, co(co(cv(s0), ctx, cii), ccn, cv(s1)), wral(s5, cuni(cv(s0)), wa(wceq(co(cv(s5), cv(s4), nat0), cfv(cv(s2), cv(s5))), wceq(co(cv(s5), cv(s4), nat1), cfv(cv(s3), cv(s5)))))))))
comment: Define the function which takes topological spaces ` X , Y ` and two continuous functions ` F , G : X --> Y ` and returns the class of homotopies from ` F ` to ` G ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 22-Feb-2015.)
